nodes.text: Varad Zagg was a Human male Sith who lived at the ruins of the Sith Academy on Umbara during the Clone Wars.

During the Clone Wars, a Jedi Knight entered the Academy and confronted Varad, who created projections of Ahsoka Tano, Anakin Skywalker, and Mace Windu to test the Jedi Knight. After the Jedi Knight dispatched of the projections, Varad threw bursts of Force lightning along with summoning Dark Acolytes to attack the Jedi. He fought bravely, but eventually died, his last words being "No, I have failed my order".
